text:
Redox - Burley, ID (local only) We are looking for a Web/Graphics/Print Designer (including some UX) with a great eye for design. We are just beginning a full rebrand and need someone to come in and help extend the branding.

Great salary with awesome benefits. Redox is a fast growing company that needs a great designer.

Send us your resume and portfolio to it[@]redoxchem.com.
